summary: SummaryColor Wow Extra Strength Dream Coat is an ultra-moisturizing anti-frizz treatment that keeps super frizz-prone hair glassy, straight + frizz-free for DAYS!
details: DetailsBenefitsAward-winning humidity-proofing technology blocks out humidity + locks in moisture to prevent smooth, straight styles from reverting back to naturally curly or frizzy textureMade for extremes: Keeps super dry/dehydrated + coily/curly hair types glassy-smooth, straight and frizz-resistant for DAYSHeat-activated formula contains heat protectantsUltra-light spray feels like nothing is on the hairEconomical; results last through 3-4 shampoosKey IngredientsUltra-moisturizing formula fills dry, porous, frizz-prone hair with internal moisture, which negates this hair type's natural urge to pull in atmospheric moisture (humidity) that makes hair puff and swellUltra-powerful (totally imperceptible) flex-elastic polymers seal down the cuticle, making the hair silky-smooth, humidity-proof + better able to hold the hair smooth and straight (even in high humidity)Formulated WithoutSulfateParabenGlutenItem 2620016How To UseShampoo, condition, and towel dry.Divide hair into sections. Spray liberally and evenly on damp (not wet) hair. Do not apply other styling products while the hair is wet. You can apply styling products after completing the Dream Coat blow-dry.Requires blow-drying with tension to activate.For best results, use every three to four shampoos.IngredientsWater/Aqua, Dipropylene Glycol, Polysilicone-29, VP/Methacrylamide /Vinyl Imidazole Copolymer, Silicone Quaternium-18, Glycerin, Trideceth-6, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Polyimide-1, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Trideceth-12, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Benzoate, Phenylpropanol, Disodium EDTA, Propanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol, Citric Acid. Formula #718-0
how_to_use: Shampoo, condition, and towel dry.Divide hair into sections. Spray liberally and evenly on damp (not wet) hair. Do not apply other styling products while the hair is wet. You can apply styling products after completing the Dream Coat blow-dry.Requires blow-drying with tension to activate.For best results, use every three to four shampoos.

reviews.headline: Travel size Extra Strength
reviews.comments: I love this product is so go i have so curly hair that this is the only product that helps me

reviews.headline: Get it
reviews.comments: I do not use heat on my hair often but when I do I will keep this spray on hand. The smell is better once you start blow drying. I have coil pattern hair and fee like I was able to straighten my hair more quickly than I anticipated. Left my hair silky and with body.

reviews.headline: Great for color refresh and straight hair.
reviews.comments: This one refreshed my color and makes my hair super smooth and straight. If you prefer something that is more volumous and holds curl, use the regular dream coat. This one will not hold curl. Its meant to straighten.

reviews.headline: It's amazing!!
reviews.comments: I normally dont write reviews but this product is just like the name "wow"!! I got the cezzanne treatment on my hair 3 months ago and find that its still slightly frizzy if I don't add product. Even after blow drying and flat ironing my hair, the next day my hair will be a bit frizzy, but not with this wow product. I was amazed at how well it stayed even after day 2&3.  The only place where it didn't work as well was at the beach, the humidity in NC beaches must be too much for the product but overall I'm pretty pleased with the magic of this product.  For reference I have very thick latin hair.

reviews.headline: Just buy it!
reviews.comments: I'm not big on doing my hair so I was not really sure to do blow dry it correctly. Definitely thought way too much into it. It poured down rain and my hair still looks AMAZING.

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: I've used this twice now and did it exactly like the bottle/multiple videos say and my hair honestly doesnt look any different than what i used previously (the Chi thermal heat spray). It also does nothibg for humidity protection, as someone who lives in the south haha. It doesnt make my hair look worse, but i cant say i'm impressed either. Will not repurchase.

reviews.headline: Absolutely Best Product for Frizzies and Humidity!
reviews.comments:
I've tried too many products to count throughout the years, always hoping that I'd finally find something that smoothed my very thick, fine-textured, wavy, older-lady-white hair that begins to "poof" up almost immediately after blow-drying it straight.  Any bit of humidity or sweat resulted also resulted in massive frizz and curl.  THIS is the miracle I've been looking for!  It's not greasy and doesn't weigh my hair down like so many other products that kind of worked did, and the results still look great three-days later!
I've tried both the regular and extra strength versions, and while both work well, the extra strength formula seems to be formulated for someone like me whose hair is on the dry side.  I love, love, love this stuff!

reviews.headline: Love this product.
reviews.comments: Great for straight hair, leaves a nice shine.

reviews.headline: What does this even do
reviews.comments: I have naturally frizzy unshiny hair that i put heat on almost everyday and i got this spray and used it all over my hair.. it honestly just feels like water and makes my hair wetter and when i style and do blowout it looks… exactly the same without it. I really dont know what its supposed to do

reviews.headline: This stuff is MAGIC!
reviews.comments: My hair is coarse, curly fine and frizzy. This product has absolutely saved me. Weather it's rainy, humid, or I am sweating my hair does not frizz when I use Dreamcoat. My hair also feels super soft after styling it!

reviews.headline: My new go to!
reviews.comments: Let's start by letting you know that I have very gray, color treated, thick, course hair. I had been using IGK Good Behavior routine (I still use) but the Color WOW is my number 1 go to now. I use the Pop and Lock and spray down with the Dream Coat. I let it air dry about 80% before blow drying and flat ironing. I spray sections with the Color Wow Mistical Shine Spray. This is the first time I'm able to get all day results even in winter (California) My hair looks and feels soft and silkie all day. I love it!

reviews.headline: I have purchased multiple times
reviews.comments: Best product I have ever found to straighten my hair a get rid of frizz.  Even on humid or rainy days my hair stays straight, it Coates your hair and makes it feel silky soft.  I have probably tried hundreds of products over the years and this is the best I have found.

reviews.headline: I will repurchase
reviews.comments: Finally, a product that does what it claims to do! No frizz all day! I have fine, blonde hair that I niw have to highlight because of aging, which makes my hair frizzy. I now get light Brazilian Blowouts to avoid having to use a flat iron. I spritz this in, blow dry, and I'm on my way! I have my youthful hair back!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Love

reviews.headline: Good but nothing "extra"
reviews.comments: I love the dream coat products but I do jot feel like this is offering anything different than the regular dream coat spray? I expected it to make my blowouts last longer but it really didn't. I will definitely buy regular dream coat again but i am not sure this is worth the extra $4

reviews.headline: Loveeee
reviews.comments: Ive used the regular Color Wow Dream Coat spray, and it was ok but my hair would still get frizzy/stop being straight by the end of the day. It made my hair super soft though so i wanted more when it ran out. Saw they have extra strength so i gave it a try and im OBSESSED. I used it to straighten my hair then i put it half up for an event. Didnt take it down before bed and slept with the hairstyle. When i finally took my hair down there wasnt even a crease from being tied up. It was so straight i left it for day 2 hair, rained all day, and its still straight and not frizzy.

reviews.headline: Loveeee
reviews.comments: Ive used the regular Color Wow Dream Coat spray, and it was ok but my hair would still get frizzy/stop being straight by the end of the day. It made my hair super soft though so i wanted more when it ran out. Saw they have extra strength so i gave it a try and im OBSESSED. I used it to straighten my hair then i put it half up for an event. Didnt take it down before bed and slept with the hairstyle. When i finally took my hair down there wasnt even a crease from being tied up. It was so straight i left it for day 2 hair, rained all day, and its still straight and not frizzy.

reviews.headline: A Must Have!
reviews.comments: I have natural hair, but I love wearing it straight. I was able to wear my hair straight all summer thanks to the spray! It didn't frizz even on the most humid days!

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: While this may be an amazing product for others it did not work for me. I have 3c-4a hair texture and had high hopes for less frizz in the Louisiana humidity. I used it as directeted and watched several videos but was still met with lots of frizz.

reviews.headline: Leaves my hair straight and shiny
reviews.comments:
I use this maybe once every 3-4 weeks bc it keeps my hair tamed for that long. I have super thick, heavy, wavy-ish hair and lots of grays, short hairs, and ends that like to frizz up. 

I spray this on my damp hair after shampoo/conditioner, split into sections and spray again. Then I just use my hair dryer brush, using tension + heat and i get beautiful straight frizz-free hair in like 30 mins. It lasts all the way to my next hair washing (usually 1-1.5 weeks depending on weather) and from there my hair remains way less frizzy and more manageable for another week or so, even with more washing or just getting it wet

And then the cycle starts again. Really nice that it keeps my hair looking presentable for so long as a working mom

faceoff_positive.comments: This stuff is the GOLD. STANDARD. If you think it's pricey? Literally MAKE room in your budget for it! My husband and I both use it, we have very different hair, and we bought our last bottle 7/21/23. It is now 10/20/23 and we still have the same bottle! (Granted we do not wash our hair often, BUT we use it every time even though it lasts through 3-4 shampoos :face_with_finger_covering_closed_lips:) I'm pretty sure I won't need to open our new bottle until next month! So that's seriously less than $0.40 a DAY. No, I do not work for Color WOW :laughing: I just know I am super-thrifty, but I'll never give this stuff up. There is *one* dupe; I gave it a good try but had to come back to Dream Coat. The dupe is ~half the price, but it def only performs half as well :confused: I'm pretty sure the polymers in Dream Coat are proprietary, so that's probably why! My hair is straight, thick, past my shoulders, colored black every 5 weeks, and has a little wave. Works AMAZING. My husband? Thin, fine, bleached-platinum shoulder-length hair, so without Dream Coat and straightening? His hair starts looking like cotton candy ☹️ WITH Dream Coat? It is smooth, silky, bouncy, it is NIGHT & DAY. I put up a review w/ pics & video on Influenster. As you can tell, I can't shut up about it lol. I have turned EVERYONE on to it. I live in Kentucky where it can be bone-chillingly cold out one day, then sticky-humid tornado weather the next :P This stuff OWNS humidity! Okay, I'll stop... But not before the BONUS: Their Mist-ical Shine Spray is also amazing & lasts even longer!   Toodles!  -an insanely avid user
faceoff_positive.headline: WISH I could post pics!!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I loved this product because it did make my hair so much less frizzy, I mean, i got caught in the rain running errands and I expected my hair to poofy up, but it didn't!
The issue came after using the product for a while. I started having massive breakage in my hair. Like practically crumbling at the slightest touch and movement. My derm diagnosed me with trichorrhexis nodosa and we narrowed it down to this product! I stopped and we are starting to see some improvement. My stylist even pulled this from her salon because of the issue she is seeing and had with herself! Please be careful!
faceoff_negative.headline: Beware of breakage!
